title: Conscience the best friend upon earth: or, The happy effects of keeping a good conscience Very useful for this age. By Henry Stubbes, Minister of the Gospel.
author: Stubbes, Henry, 1606?-1678.
publisher: printed and are to be sold by John Hancock at the sign of the Three Bibles in Popes Head Alley in Cornhill,
